ygData.subject: Re: A Review of Activation Functions in SharpNEAT
ygData.msgSnippet: Jeff, I ve rerun the Retina Task experiments using logistic units instead of ReLus for the K^2 Graph. I expect my findings to be similar for HyperNEAT and
